q0.question: Maximus leads a victory over the legionnaires of whom?
q0.recall: Maximus leads a victory over a more powerful force in a recreation of the Battle of Zama (incorrectly named the Battle of Carthage) at the Colosseum. It is not specified which legionnaires he defeats.
q0.vectordb: Maximus leads a victory over Germanic barbarians, not legionnaires.
q0.hybrid: Maximus leads a victory over Germanic barbarians, not legionnaires.
